review: We trust only two doctors in bangalore for our daughter and she is one of them. Extremely careful about her treatment over last 3yrs of visit.

Am very greatful to Dr Sujatha mam. My child who has a ceziure background was affected with covid. We had lost our hopes. It was Dr Sujatha mam and her team in PICU who treated my child with such care. Me and my husband will always be thankful PICU team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had very bad experience with this doctor in Rainbow hospital. Child was admitted with high fever and stomach problems. Doctor was very rude  and not ready to listen to parents opinions. They did all the tests including CT, Meningitis and encephalitis and everything came negative and final conclusion is it can be due to food poisoning.  Same thing when we told at beginning,they were not ready to listen. Never recommend hospital or doctor
